title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: The Sleep Debt Tracker is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML designed to help users visualize and manage their sleep debt by tracking their sleep schedule and calculating the accumulated sleep deficit. This repository serves as a practical application of TypeScript and modern web development techniques, providing a user-friendly interface for monitoring and improving sleep habits.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a personal project built with Next.js 14 (using the pages router), TypeScript, and React Query, leveraging MUI for a visually appealing and component-based UI. It serves as a development dashboard, experimenting with modern web development techniques and showcasing a practical application of these technologies for managing and visualizing project data.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project showcasing a modern, responsive dashboard built with Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, and CSS. This repository serves as a practical example of implementing dynamic user interfaces and data visualization using Next.js's server-side rendering and client-side interactivity, making it a valuable resource for learning and building similar applications.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a full-stack voting application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to provide a seamless and intuitive experience for creating and participating in polls. This project showcases a modern web development approach, focusing on clean code, efficient UI/UX, and real-time data management, making it a valuable resource for learning about Next.js and best practices in building interactive web applications.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository hosts a web-based interface built using JavaScript, Python (likely for backend services), HTML, and CSS, designed to visualize and interact with data from robotic fleets, potentially focusing on project-specific goals related to monitoring and control. This project provides a user-friendly dashboard for managing and observing robotic systems, allowing for real-time insights and control capabilities.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project showcasing interactive map visualizations built using HTML and Python. This repository provides a foundation for creating custom map-based applications, leveraging web technologies for dynamic and engaging data representation on geographic maps. The project demonstrates techniques for integrating data with map interfaces, making it ideal for exploring spatial datasets and building location-aware applications.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a full-stack CRUD application built with Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting. This project demonstrates a practical implementation of a web application, covering topics such as database interaction, backend logic, frontend design, and overall project structure, providing a foundation for learning and building similar applications.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting for conveniently visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. This project provides a user-friendly interface to parse, filter, and display ROS log data, enabling developers to efficiently debug and understand their ROS-based systems. As a project focused on improving the ROS development workflow, ros-log-viewer aims to offer a powerful and accessible log analysis solution.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebook and Python, houses a collection of projects focused on applying Python to finance. It explores various financial concepts and techniques through practical examples and code implementations, providing a resource for learning and experimenting with financial analysis using Python.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-idea-board is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to provide a collaborative and visually appealing platform for brainstorming and organizing ideas. This interactive idea board allows users to easily add, categorize, and prioritize their thoughts, fostering creativity and effective project management within teams. It leverages modern web technologies to deliver a responsive and user-friendly experience.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a full-stack project built with TypeScript, Vite, Express.js, and leverages the Gemini API to create an interactive experience. title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-event-calendar is a JavaScript-based project showcasing a customizable and interactive event calendar. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it allows users to dynamically add, view, and manage events, providing a user-friendly experience for scheduling and organization. This repository demonstrates fundamental web development principles and event management techniques.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: iot-asset-tracking is a full-stack Next.js project leveraging TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase to build a robust and scalable web application for managing and tracking IoT assets. This project demonstrates a modern approach to building real-time dashboards and interfaces with a focus on efficient data handling and user-friendly design, perfect for learning and prototyping asset tracking solutions.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the LaTeX source code and generated HTML version of my resume, showcasing my skills and experience. Built primarily using TeX for a professional and customizable layout, the project utilizes HTML for easy online accessibility and display. It serves as a personal project demonstrating document creation and web presentation techniques.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-seller is a full-stack e-commerce project built with Next.js 14 (pages router) and TypeScript, showcasing a modern online fruit store. It utilizes React Query for efficient data fetching and management, MUI for a polished user interface, and incorporates robust type safety throughout the codebase. This repository serves as a practical example of building a complete e-commerce application with cutting-edge technologies and best practices.
